alert.note: Alert for Schuyler (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:40PM EDT until July 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SCHUYLER...NORTHWESTERN BROOME...SOUTHERN CORTLAND...NORTHEASTERN CHEMUNG...NORTHERN TIOGA AND SOUTHERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 339 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Besemer to near Erin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newfield, Danby, Caroline, Berkshire, Richford, Whitney Point, Harford, Marathon, Lapeer and Cayuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
